Name: Baccio Punch
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and soda water. Lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: A classic for aniseed lovers only.
History: The origin of this vintage cocktail is unknown but it in Italian its name means 'kiss'.
Nutrition: One serving of Baccio Punch contains 228 calories
